as="sourcePoint"/><mxPoint x="170" y="420" as="targetPoint"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="36" value="" style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;fontSize=18;rotation=-180;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="340" y="160" width="20" height="260" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="37" value="summary_memory（新）<br>长期记忆" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=18;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="380" y="270" width="210" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="38" value="" style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;flipH=1;fontSize=18;rotation=-90;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="105" y="-35" width="20" height="290" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="39" value="full_message_list" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=18;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="40" y="60" width="150" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="40" value="" style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;fontSize=18;rotation=-180;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="340" y="480" width="20" height="120" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="41" value="短期记忆" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=18;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="380" y="520" width="210" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="42" value="<meta charset="utf-8"><ul class="has-list-bullet" style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; word-spacing: 0px;"><li style="box-sizing: border-box"><code style="box-sizing: border-box ; padding: 0.1em 0.25em">last_memory_index</code>：上次总结的长期记忆中最新记忆的索引；</li><li style="box-sizing: border-box"><div class="list-bullet" style="box-sizing: border-box ; color: transparent ; position: relative ; display: inline-flex ; justify-content: center ; align-items: center ; float: left ; margin-left: -1em"></div><code style="box-sizing: border-box ; padding: 0.1em 0.25em">min(next_message_to_add_index)</code>：短期记忆中最旧记忆的索引；</li></ul>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=#d6b656;fillColor=#fff2cc;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="-120" y="640" width="550" height="90" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>

ul.style: box-sizing: border-box ; color: rgb(34 , 34 , 34) ; font-size: 16px ; font-style: normal ; font-weight: 400 ; letter-spacing: normal ; text-indent: 0px ; text-transform: none ; word-spacing: 0px
ul.li: last_memory_index：上次总结的长期记忆中最新记忆的索引；
min(next_message_to_add_index)：短期记忆中最旧记忆的索引；
